body: LEAD: Every Thursday and Sunday morning, from April through October, a bus leaves the Gray Line terminal on Eighth Avenue, threads its way downtown to Canal, crosses the Manhattan Bridge and spends the next six hours in Brooklyn. title: The Coarse and the Sacred Are Fused in Shadow Plays

body: LEAD: A headline yesterday with an article about ferry service in New York City incorrectly described the status of two lines. title: CORRECTION
